mn133:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati tapodarame.
mn133:1.3: Atha kho ayasma samiddhi rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthaya yena tapodo tenupasankami gattani parisincitum.
mn133:1.4: Tapode gattani parisincitva paccuttaritva ekacivaro atthasi gattani pubbapayamano.
mn133:1.5: Atha kho annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam tapodam obhasetva yenayasma samiddhi tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho sa devata ayasmantam samiddhim etadavoca:
mn133:2.2: “Na kho aham, avuso, dharemi bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca.
mn133:2.3: Tvam panavuso, dharesi bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca”ti?
mn133:2.4: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dharemi bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca.
mn133:2.5: Dharesi pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gatha”ti?
mn133:2.6: “Na kho aham, avuso, dharemi bhaddekarattiyo gathati.
mn133:2.8: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu na dharemi bhaddekarattiyo gathati.
mn133:2.9: Ugganhahi tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca;
mn133:2.10: pariyapunahi tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca;
mn133:2.11: dharehi tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca.
mn133:2.12: Atthasamhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhango ca adibrahmacariyako”ti.
mn133:3.1: Atha kho ayasma samiddhi tassa rattiya accayena yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma samiddhi bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn133:3.2: “Idhaham, bhante, rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthaya yena tapodo tenupasankamim gattani parisincitum.
mn133:3.3: Tapode gattani parisincitva paccuttaritva ekacivaro atthasim gattani pubbapayamano.
mn133:3.4: Atha kho bhante, annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam tapodam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho sa devata mam etadavoca:
mn133:4.1: Evam vutte, aham, bhante, tam devatam etadavocam:
mn133:4.2: ‘na kho aham, avuso, dharemi bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca.
mn133:4.3: Tvam panavuso, dharesi bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca’ti?
mn133:4.4: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dharemi bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca.
mn133:4.5: Dharesi pana tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gatha’ti?
mn133:4.6: ‘Na kho aham, avuso, dharemi bhaddekarattiyo gathati.
mn133:4.8: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dharemi bhaddekarattiyo gathati.
mn133:4.9: Ugganhahi tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca;
mn133:4.10: pariyapunahi tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca;
mn133:4.11: dharehi tvam, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca.
mn133:4.12: Atthasamhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhango ca adibrahmacariyako’ti.
mn133:4.15: Sadhu me, bhante, bhagava bhaddekarattassa uddesanca vibhanganca desetu”ti.
mn133:4.16: “Tena hi, bhikkhu, sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
mn133:4.17: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma samiddhi bhagavato paccassosi.
mn133:6.2: idam vatvana sugato utthayasana viharam pavisi.
mn133:7.1: Atha kho tesam bhikkhunam, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi:
mn133:7.2: “idam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
mn133:7.19: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajeyya”ti?
mn133:7.21: “ayam kho ayasma mahakaccano satthu ceva samvannito sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam;
mn133:7.22: pahoti cayasma mahakaccano imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
mn133:7.23: Yannuna mayam yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankameyyama; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakaccanam etamattham patipuccheyyama”ti.
mn133:7.24: Atha kho te bhikkhu yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmata mahakaccanena saddhim sammodimsu.
mn133:7.25: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu ayasmantam mahakaccanam etadavocum:
mn133:7.26: “idam kho no, avuso kaccana, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
mn133:7.31: Tesam no, avuso kaccana, amhakam, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi—
mn133:7.32: idam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
mn133:8.1: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajeyyati?
mn133:8.2: Tesam no, avuso kaccana, amhakam etadahosi:
mn133:8.3: ‘ayam kho ayasma mahakaccano satthu ceva samvannito sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
mn133:8.4: Pahoti cayasma mahakaccano imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
mn133:8.5: Yannuna mayam yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankameyyama; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakaccanam etamattham patipuccheyyama’ti.
mn133:9.1: “Seyyathapi, avuso, puriso saratthiko saragavesi sarapariyesanam caramano mahato rukkhassa titthato saravato atikkammeva mulam atikkamma khandham sakhapalase saram pariyesitabbam manneyya;
mn133:9.2: evamsampadamidam ayasmantanam satthari sammukhibhute tam bhagavantam atisitva amhe etamattham patipucchitabbam mannatha.
mn133:9.3: So havuso, bhagava janam janati, passam passati, cakkhubhuto nanabhuto dhammabhuto brahmabhuto vatta pavatta atthassa ninneta amatassa data dhammassami tathagato.
mn133:9.4: So ceva panetassa kalo ahosi yam bhagavantamyeva etamattham patipuccheyyatha, yatha vo bhagava byakareyya tatha nam dhareyyatha”ti.
mn133:10.1: “Addhavuso kaccana, bhagava janam janati, passam passati, cakkhubhuto nanabhuto dhammabhuto brahmabhuto vatta pavatta atthassa ninneta amatassa data dhammassami tathagato.
mn133:10.2: So ceva panetassa kalo ahosi yam bhagavantamyeva etamattham patipuccheyyama;
mn133:10.3: yatha no bhagava byakareyya tatha nam dhareyyama.
mn133:10.4: Api cayasma mahakaccano satthu ceva samvannito sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam;
mn133:10.5: pahoti cayasma mahakaccano imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
mn133:11.1: “Tena havuso, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
mn133:11.2: “Evamavuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahakaccanassa paccassosum.
mn133:12.1: “Yam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
mn133:12.6: Imassa kho aham, avuso, bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa evam vittharena attham ajanami—
mn133:13.2: Iti me cakkhu ahosi atitamaddhanam iti rupati—
mn133:13.3: tattha chandaragappatibaddham hoti vinnanam, chandaragappatibaddhatta vinnanassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto atitam anvagameti.
mn133:13.4: Iti me sotam ahosi atitamaddhanam iti saddati …pe…
mn133:13.5: iti me ghanam ahosi atitamaddhanam iti gandhati …
mn133:13.6: iti me jivha ahosi atitamaddhanam iti rasati …
mn133:13.7: iti me kayo ahosi atitamaddhanam iti photthabbati …
mn133:13.8: iti me mano ahosi atitamaddhanam iti dhammati—
mn133:13.9: tattha chandaragappatibaddham hoti vinnanam, chandaragappatibaddhatta vinnanassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto atitam anvagameti—
mn133:14.2: Iti me cakkhu ahosi atitamaddhanam iti rupati—
mn133:14.3: tattha na chandaragappatibaddham hoti vinnanam, na chandaragappatibaddhatta vinnanassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto atitam nanvagameti.
mn133:14.4: Iti me sotam ahosi atitamaddhanam iti saddati …pe…
mn133:14.5: iti me ghanam ahosi atitamaddhanam iti gandhati …
mn133:14.6: iti me jivha ahosi atitamaddhanam iti rasati …
mn133:14.7: iti me kayo ahosi atitamaddhanam iti photthabbati …
mn133:14.8: iti me mano ahosi atitamaddhanam iti dhammati—
mn133:14.9: tattha na chandaragappatibaddham hoti vinnanam, na chandaragappatibaddhatta vinnanassa, na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto atitam nanvagameti—
mn133:15.2: Iti me cakkhu siya anagatamaddhanam iti rupati—
mn133:15.3: appatiladdhassa patilabhaya cittam panidahati, cetaso panidhanapaccaya tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto anagatam patikankhati.
mn133:15.4: Iti me sotam siya anagatamaddhanam iti saddati …pe…
mn133:15.5: iti me ghanam siya anagatamaddhanam iti gandhati …
mn133:15.6: iti me jivha siya anagatamaddhanam iti rasati …
mn133:15.7: iti me kayo siya anagatamaddhanam iti photthabbati …
mn133:15.8: iti me mano siya anagatamaddhanam iti dhammati—
mn133:15.9: appatiladdhassa patilabhaya cittam panidahati, cetaso panidhanapaccaya tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto anagatam patikankhati—
mn133:16.2: Iti me cakkhu siya anagatamaddhanam iti rupati—
mn133:16.3: appatiladdhassa patilabhaya cittam nappanidahati, cetaso appanidhanapaccaya na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto anagatam nappatikankhati.
mn133:16.4: Iti me sotam siya anagatamaddhanam iti saddati …pe…
mn133:16.5: iti me ghanam siya anagatamaddhanam iti gandhati …
mn133:16.6: iti me jivha siya anagatamaddhanam iti rasati …
mn133:16.7: iti me kayo siya anagatamaddhanam iti photthabbati …
mn133:16.8: iti me mano siya anagatamaddhanam iti dhammati—
mn133:16.9: appatiladdhassa patilabhaya cittam nappanidahati, cetaso appanidhanapaccaya na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto anagatam nappatikankhati—
mn133:17.4: Tasmince paccuppanne chandaragappatibaddham hoti vinnanam, chandaragappatibaddhatta vinnanassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu samhirati.
mn133:17.7: ya cavuso, jivha ye ca rasa …
mn133:17.8: yo cavuso, kayo ye ca photthabba …
mn133:17.9: yo cavuso, mano ye ca dhamma—
mn133:17.11: Tasmince paccuppanne chandaragappatibaddham hoti vinnanam, chandaragappatibaddhatta vinnanassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu samhirati—
mn133:17.12: evam kho, avuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu samhirati.
mn133:18.1: Kathanca, avuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na samhirati?
mn133:18.4: Tasmince paccuppanne na chandaragappatibaddham hoti vinnanam, na chandaragappatibaddhatta vinnanassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu na samhirati.
mn133:18.7: ya cavuso, jivha ye ca rasa …
mn133:18.8: yo cavuso, kayo ye ca photthabba …
mn133:18.9: yo cavuso, mano ye ca dhamma—
mn133:18.11: Tasmince paccuppanne na chandaragappatibaddham hoti vinnanam, na chandaragappatibaddhatta vinnanassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu na samhirati—
mn133:18.12: evam kho, avuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na samhirati.
mn133:19.1: Yam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
mn133:19.6: Imassa kho aham, avuso, bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa evam vittharena attham ajanami.
mn133:19.7: Akankhamana ca pana tumhe ayasmanto bhagavantamyeva upasankamitva etamattham patipuccheyyatha,
mn133:19.8: yatha vo bhagava byakaroti tatha nam dhareyyatha”ti.
mn133:20.1: Atha kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahakaccanassa bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
mn133:20.2: “yam kho no, bhante, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
mn133:20.7: Tesam no, bhante, amhakam, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi:
mn133:20.8: ‘idam kho no, avuso, bhagava sankhittena uddesam uddisitva vittharena attham avibhajitva utthayasana viharam pavittho:
mn133:20.25: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajeyya’ti?
mn133:20.27: ‘ayam kho ayasma mahakaccano satthu ceva samvannito sambhavito ca vinnunam sabrahmacarinam.
mn133:20.28: Pahoti cayasma mahakaccano imassa bhagavata sankhittena uddesassa udditthassa vittharena attham avibhattassa vittharena attham vibhajitum.
mn133:20.29: Yannuna mayam yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankameyyama; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakaccanam etamattham patipuccheyyama’ti.
mn133:20.30: Atha kho mayam, bhante, yenayasma mahakaccano tenupasankamimha; upasankamitva ayasmantam mahakaccanam etamattham patipucchimha.
mn133:20.31: Tesam no, bhante, ayasmata mahakaccanena imehi akarehi imehi padehi imehi byanjanehi attho vibhatto”ti.
mn133:21.2: Mancepi tumhe, bhikkhave, etamattham patipuccheyyatha, ahampi tam evamevam byakareyyam yatha tam mahakaccanena byakatam.
mn133:21.3: Eso cevetassa attho. Evanca nam dharetha”ti.
mn133:21.5: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
